content: regardless of skill level please read through entire pattern before beginning hook used/finished and blocked sizes ▪ worsted weight 4 ply 4 5 mm hook 10 ▪ light worsted weight 3 ply 3 75 mm hook 9 crochet terms us terminology throughout skill level beginning intermediate gauge 4 x 4 square = 15 single_crochet x 16 row using 4 5 mm hook yarn and colors used ▪ i love this cotton worsted weight 100% cotton  worsted weight 4 ply a glowing b bright citrus c deep teal d buttercup ▪ additional items needed stitch markers and yarn darning needle stitches used double magic_ring yo yarn over shallow bpdc shallow back post double_crochet standing stitch round round 3dc-cluster three double_crochet-cluster invisible join join slip_stitch slipstitch fptr2tog front post treble_crochet 2 together st s stitch/stitches single_crochet single_crochet fptr front post treble_crochet space space half_double_crochet half_double_crochet chain-2 picot skip skip double_crochet double_crochet chain-3 picot chain chain fpdc front post double_crochet 3lp third loop of st double magic_ring video right-handed / left-handed standing stitch start with a slip knot on your hook insert your hook into designated st or chain space and finish the st as normal video right-handed / left-handed invisible join do not join after completing last st of the round cut yarn pull yarn tail through st insert hook from back-to-front of the 2nd st of the round grab yarn and gently pull through insert hook from back-to-front and bottom-to-top of the slip_stitch center of the last st of round grab yarn and gently pull insert hook into designated st yo pull yarn through st and through loop on hook anchor on backside by drawing through any loops of first single_crochet and last sts of round and weave in ends video right-handed insert hook into designated st yo and pull up a loop yo pull / left-handed through 2 loops on hook zeyda mandala a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2024 page 1 of 10 half_double_crochet yo insert hook into st yo pull up a loop yo pull through 3 loops on hook double_crochet yo insert hook into st yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times fpdc yo insert hook from front-to-back-to-front around post so post is in front of hook yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times shallow bpdc yo insert hook from back-to-front-to-back around v part of st post so post is in back of hook yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times chain-3 picot complete st as indicated chain 3 3dc-cluster insert hook into back bar of first chain yo pull through all loops yo insert hook into designated st yo pull up a loop yo pull on hook through 2 loops on hook yo insert hook in same st yo pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops on hook 2 times yo pull through all 4 loops on hook fptr2tog yo 2 times
